High cost is one of the primary concerns in software development. Due to this, businesses have shifted their focus towards offshoring their software projects and looking for reliable software companies.

A top offshore software development company helps businesses:

    • Avoid project delays
    • Adhere to quality standards
    • Meet business goals using the latest technologies

Choosing the right offshore development company, however, can be challenging

So, we have prepared a list of 10 best offshore software development companies. This list includes companies with proven credibility that will help you make an informed choice.

We considered the following criteria while evaluating the best offshore software development firms:

    • Industry experience
    • Client ratings
    • Company portfolio
    • Post-launch support capabilities and more

 

Top Offshore Software Development Companies

Based on the factors above, these are the top offshore software development agencies you can rely on.

1. PixelCrayons

Being one of the best offshore software development companies, they provide comprehensive software solutions to Enterprises, ISVs, Digital Agencies, and Startups.

Since their inception in 2004, they have served over 5,400 clients across 38+ countries. Headquartered in India, they are renowned for their agile/DevOps development practices, SLA commitment, and consistent on-time project delivery.

Their innovative digital solutions empower businesses of all sizes to enhance efficiency, drive growth, and gain a competitive advantage in today’s fast-paced market.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Trusted by Startups and Fortune 500 Companies: This includes Kia, BERD, Dubai Police, Qatar Airways, SAVE, etc.

Client-centric Strategies: When a consultation is scheduled, they discuss solutions and team structure to get started.

Excellent Industry Insights: You can have recent industry insights through their blog posts and case studies.

Services Offered: Development consulting, Product architecture, UI & UX design, Product development, Product testing, DevOps, API development, MVP development, SaaS product development, Digital Marketing

2. invertio

Since 2004, invertio has been a global leader in delivering offshore software development services. With a staff of more than 675+ experts, we have completed more than 4200 projects for clients in more than 33 countries.

Trusted by startups to Fortune 500 companies, we offer world-class software solutions that empower businesses across all industries and have 2500+ satisfied customers till today.

Our team’s dedication to quality, innovation, and customer care has earned them a reputation as a trusted partner in the offshore development of software.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Provide Digital Excellence: They develop robust and scalable digital solutions to help businesses stay at the forefront of technology.

Awards & Certifications: This is a CMMI Level 3 company and a Google partner with an excellent rating on Clutch and Goodfirms.

Advanced Tech Stacks: Their software experts use modern tech stacks including Golang, React, Vue, Firebase, AI/ML etc.

Services Offered: Software development services, IT outsourcing, Startup product development, UI/UX design, MVP development, SaaS development, QA & testing, Migration & modernization, Digital transformation, DevOps

Cut Development Costs by 40% Offshore

We help you reduce your software development expenses without compromising quality.

Contact Us

3. Mobomo

Mobomo is one of the best software development firms in Vienna, Virginia. While it is renowned for mobile app development and cloud computing solutions, its core expertise lies in open-source CMS platforms like Drupal, Ruby-on-Rails, and WordPress.

Mobomo gained widespread recognition after relaunching NASA’s website, earning four Webby Awards for its mobile-responsive design. It has also partnered with prominent government organizations.

Their accolades include awards from Clutch and a spot on the Inc. 5000 list for nine consecutive years. If you’re seeking a mobile app or web solution that excels in both performance and exceptional UI/UX, Mobomo should be at the top of your list

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Awards & Recognitions: Mobomo has been recognized as a Global Leader and as a Top Development firm.

Digital Services Coalition: Mobomo officially joins the digital services coalition (dsc) to help build a better government.

CMMI Dev Level 3 Certified: Our CMMI Dev Level 3 best practices paired with our partnerships with Amazon, Acquia, and Microsoft.

Services Offered: Software product development services, Startup product development services, IT outsourcing services, Offshore software development services, Enterprise software development, Enterprise software development, Custom software development services

4. BairesDev

This San Francisco-based company was founded in 2009. It has achieved significant recognition, receiving multiple awards, including being named a top B2B company by Clutch EY Entrepreneur of the Year.

Specializing in various industries such as fintech, HR, digital marketing, and insurance, it has established itself as a top IT service provider.

Additionally, the company offers offshore software development services, making it an excellent choice for projects that need expert Python developers. If you are looking for an offshore software product development company, BairesDev is a strong contender.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Key Domain Expertise: Their portfolio has projects for over 100 clients across 20+ different industries.

Lean Approach: Having an in-depth understanding of how businesses work, their experts know that requirements and market demand can change.

Reasonable Price: They carefully plan the scope of work and schedule the delivery to achieve the best results within your budget.

Services Offered: Startup product development, Software development services, Software outsourcing, Staff augmentation

Also read: Latest Technologies Transforming Software Development Landscape

5. Radixweb

Based in India, Radixweb specializes in offshore software development and has successfully delivered multiple projects. The company offers essential services for modern product development, including the discovery phase and IT staff augmentation.

Its team has expertise across various industries such as marketing, real estate, logistics, and healthcare.

It is skilled in developing solutions like data visualization dashboards, SaaS applications, online marketplaces, booking systems, content-sharing platforms, streaming services, and location-sharing apps.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

High-End Technical Consulting: They provide high-end technical consulting and software development services so you can focus on business growth.

Custom Solutions: This includes SaaS applications, Data visualization dashboards, Property management platforms, Location-based apps, AI Custom Solutions.

Unique Toolset: This includes D3.js, Angular, Redux, JavaScript, Docker, Ionic, Express.js, AWS etc.

Services Offered: Business analysis, Project management, Digital Transformation, App architecture development, Software product development, Custom application development, Software testing services, DevOps services

Need Faster Offshore Software Development?

Access our experienced developers and speed up your software delivery with offshore teams.

Contact Us

6. Appinventive

It is one of the top software development companies in India. Since then, it has expanded rapidly, with headquarters in New York and development hubs across Australia.

It specializes in cloud services, electric vehicles services, mobile app development, DevOps and Blockchain services.

With expertise in multiple programming languages such as JavaScript, Swift, Python, and Go and frameworks and CMS like NodeJS, Angular, and React, the company offers flexibility in selecting the ideal tech stack for your fintech project.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Vibrant Web3 Community: It is part of a thriving web3 community. Their extensive network allows them to connect their clients with top-notch Web3 VC and marketing agencies.

Client-Focused Approach: They go all out to live up to this image and do their best to fulfill their client’s expectations.

Safe & Secure Partnership: They provide their clients with extra peace of mind by signing an NDA to protect their ideas.

Services Offered: Ideation and product design, Enterprise software development, Offshore software development services, Startup product development services, Software development services, Digital transformation, Telecom

Also read: Top 20+ Custom Software Development Companies

7. Intellectsoft

For over 17 years, it has been helping Fortune 500 companies and established brands build solid software foundations for their businesses. They aim to help enterprises to accelerate the adoption of the latest technologies and solve complex issues.

It holds technology excellence in IoT, DevOps, Software engineering, UX, and AI. Their experts provide ongoing support through IS360 framework. They have received awards such as top software company by Goodfirms, best app development company by Appindex etc.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Bespoke Software Solutions: It has built innovative software solutions for different industries, including Automotive, Fintech, and Edtech.

Cloud Migration: It has cloud systems and digital transformation services expertise to ensure your migration is secure, efficient, and aligned with goals.

Success Stories: It has done successful projects of top companies, including Jaguar, EY, Harley-Davidson, Guinness

Services Offered: AR/VR development, UX/UI design services, Full stack development, Custom software development services, Software product development services, Offshore software development services

8. Zazz

Zazz is one of the top offshore software development companies with a global presence. It operates across 14 offices and has a team of 275 professionals. It is a trusted partner of industry giants like Microsoft, Google, Apple, Amazon, SAP, and Roku.

Focusing primarily on the healthcare, hospitality, leisure, and fintech sectors, Zazz has developed popular apps such as Mindset, Settlyt, Roundup, WeCare, and Frenzy.

Their development expertise centers around Swift and Kotlin, but their engineers are also skilled in Java, Python, PHP, and more. This versatility ensures they can select the optimal tech stack for any project.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Certified Professionals: It is a certified American mobile app development company at the forefront of software development.

Trusted By Big Brands: This includes LION, Canadian Beef, Camfil, BASF, Toronto Star, Diet Center, ECAO, etc.

Provide Digital Solutions: They architected and maintained digital solutions for hundreds of Startups, government agencies and Fortune 500 companies.

Services Offered: Mobile app development, Web app development, Product designing, IoT app development, Blockchain development, AR/VR development, Mobile backend engineering services, Enterprise software development, Offshore software development services

Save Time and Resources on Custom Software

Our offshore experts deliver custom solutions tailored to your business needs on time and within budget.

Contact Us

9. ChicMic

ChicMic is one of the best offshore software development companies. It has rapidly established itself as a key player in the industry. Over the past 12 years, ChicMic has successfully delivered over 2,000 projects.

In recent years, ChicMic has expanded its expertise into blockchain and NFT development, Web 3.0 solutions, metaverse projects, and the PC game development sector, including game concept art, asset creation, and animations.

While the company primarily utilizes Objective C for development, they also work with Swift, C#, and PHP. If you want to create a viral game or a mobile application with stunning design and an exceptional user experience, ChicMic is well-equipped to bring your vision to life.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Pioneering Market Mastery: It is ranked among the top web and app development companies, and it has received awards such as UpWork, SiliconIndia, and Techreviewer.

Esteemed Partnership: They have partners such as Swiggy, P&G, Stanford university, Microsoft, Cardano.

Quality Services: They provide quality software solutions using tech stack such as Flutter, Angular, PHP, Python, React.JS

Services Offered: Startup product development services, Software product development services, Software product development services, IT outsourcing services, IT outsourcing services, IT outstaffing services

10. Solwit

With over 13 years of experience and more than 300 employees, Solwit SA specializes in delivering comprehensive offshore software development and application testing services.

Solwit’s diverse client base includes companies in hardware manufacturing, healthcare equipment, retail solutions, waste management, and smart devices.
For years, the company has been recognized as one of the best software development firms. In 2023, it joined the global Alten Group.

With their software engineering and testing expertise, now is an ideal time to partner with Solwit SA for your digital product development needs.

What Makes Them Different From Others:

Clear Transfer Of Ip Rights: Their experts develop software solutions and transfer full IP rights to clients.

Proven Technology Partner: Their team comprises over 350 specialists, including developers, testers, and DevOps.

Awards & Certifications: This includes ISO 27001, Information Security Management System, and ISO 22301, Business Continuity Management System.

Services Offered: Software development services, IoT software development, Managed cloud services, IT outsourcing services, Software product development services, Enterprise software development

Struggling with Scaling Your Development Team?

We can help you scale faster and more efficiently with your offshore software development needs.

Contact Us

How to Choose the Right Offshore Software Development Partner for Your Business?

When selecting the best offshore software development company, consider the following tips to ensure you make the best choice for your business:

Business Goals with Tech Expertise

  • Ensure the partner understands your industry and business objectives.
  • Look for a provider with a proven track record in delivering solutions that align with your strategic goals.

Customization Abilities

  • Choose a partner tailored to your business needs.
  • Hire developers who assess their ability to integrate with your existing tools.

Post Launch Support

  • Prioritize providers offering robust and responsive support services.
  • Consider ongoing training and resources available to help your team maximize its potential.

Long-Term Partnership Potential

  • Look for a partner interested in building a long-term relationship, offering continuous updates and enhancements.
  • Hire dedicated software development teams who can assess their ability to scale and adapt new technologies.

Case Studies & Testimonials

  • Research client success stories and reviews to gauge the partner’s reliability and customer satisfaction.
  • Seek feedback from existing clients to understand the partner’s strengths and areas for improvement.

Also read: Top 9 Software Development Companies In India

Which Software Development Company Will You Choose?

Choosing the best offshore/nearshore software development company is the primary step in taking your business dream a reality. Hence, it is essential to evaluate each company’s expertise, conduct background checks, check client reviews, and ensure basic alignment with your project needs.

Remember that your final decision should be based on your business requirements, project scope, budget constraints, and the product type you want to launch.

If you are ready now to start your offshore software development journey, contact us for excellent support and expert guidance. Feel free to consult our software experts today!
